title: Riot, could we make Sweeping Lense a viable late game option?
body:
All of the other trinkets are worth having post-lvl 9 (most noteably {{item:3361}} which everyone can start the game with) so why not {{item:3341}}?

P.S. I'd also like to see {{item:3362}} make a comeback.

replies.body: the upgrade is free, theres no point of making it more viable then it already is.
I don't understand your reasoning. {{item:3363}} is free and yet {{item:3361}} is still viable post-9. Sweeper is completely outclassed by oracles.
I rarely see post 9 base trinket though unless your in low elo where people forget to upgrade their trinkets..
Hm? Base trinket is really good. Usually it's just the adc and maybe the mid laner who upgrades it. I'm plat so I think the people I play with are pretty good.
